title: Using the rgen Samplers
text: Within C++ file, rgen package provides Rcpp plugins’ depends statement must included rgen.h header. plugin statement indicates dependency rgen. Note: Since rgen relies upon RcppArmadillo, must include RcppArmadillo.h header include traditional Rcpp dependency attribute, e.g. // [[Rcpp::depends(RcppArmadillo)]]. example, following allow sample inverse wishart distribution:
code: #include <RcppArmadillo.h>  // [[Rcpp::depends(RcppArmadillo)]]  #include <rgen.h>  // [[Rcpp::depends(rgen)]] #include <RcppArmadillo.h> // [[Rcpp::depends(RcppArmadillo)]]  #include <rgen.h> // [[Rcpp::depends(rgen)]]  // Surface the riwishart function in the rgen package into R. // [[Rcpp::export]] arma::mat riwishart(unsigned int df, const arma::mat& S) {     return rgen::riwishart(df, S); }  /*** R # Set seed for reproducibility set.seed(111)  # Call the C++ function from R riwishart(3, diag(2)) */

title: Using the rgen Samplers
text: use rgen R package, modify DESCRIPTION file adding: use C++11, may wish add following src/Makevars src/Makevars.win file:
